reg_info.act_under: Chiropody Act, 1991   Loi de 1991 sur les podologues

content.content: 1. (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of five persons as follows: 1. The President and Vice-President of the Council. 2. If the President and Vice-President are members of the College, one additional member of the Council who is a member of the College and two members of the Council who are appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. 3. If the President and Vice-President are appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council, three members of the Council who are members of the College. 4. If one of the President or Vice-President is appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council, two additional members of the Council who are members of the College and one additional member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 1 (1). (2) The President of the Council shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of five persons as follows:

1. The President and Vice-President of the Council.

2. If the President and Vice-President are members of the College, one additional member of the Council who is a member of the College and two members of the Council who are appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

3. If the President and Vice-President are appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council, three members of the Council who are members of the College.

4. If one of the President or Vice-President is appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council, two additional members of the Council who are members of the College and one additional member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 1 (1).

(2) The President of the Council shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. The Registration Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. (c) one academic member. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The Registration Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

(c) one academic member. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The Complaints Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. The Complaints Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The Discipline Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4. The Discipline Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 4.

content.content: 5. The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 5.
content.raw_html:
5. The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 5.

content.content: 6. The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; (c) two members of the College who are not members of the Council; and (d) one academic member. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 6.
content.raw_html:
6. The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council;

(c) two members of the College who are not members of the Council; and

(d) one academic member. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 6.

content.content: 7. The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 7.
content.raw_html:
7. The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 708/93, s. 7.

content.content: 8. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 708/93, s. 8.
content.raw_html: 8. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 708/93, s. 8.
